Method Detail

addExternalHandler

public void addExternalHandler(java.lang.Object newHandler,
                               int type)
Allows external helper classes to be added to JPedal to alter default functionality.

If Options.FormsActionHandler is the type then the newHandler should be of the form org.jpedal.objects.acroforms.ActionHandler

If Options.JPedalActionHandler is the type then the newHandler should be of the form Map which contains Command Integers, mapped onto their respective org.jpedal.examples.simpleviewer.gui.swing.JPedalActionHandler implementations. For example, to create a custom help action, you would add to your map, Integer(Commands.HELP) -> JPedalActionHandler. For a tutorial on creating custom actions in the SimpleViewer, see http://www.jpedal.org/support.php

Parameters:
newHandler -
type -
